snippet: As Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton arrived in China on Tuesday, editorials, articles and comments by analysts in Chinese media contained unusual bite.
abstract: Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton arrives in Beijing to a barrage of unusually harsh coverage in China’s official news media over what they called American meddling in territorial disputes in the region; sharpness stems from tensions over China’s increasingly assertive claims to islands in the South China Sea.

byline.original: By STEVEN LEE MYERS and JANE PERLEZ

lead_paragraph: As Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton arrived in China on Tuesday, editorials, articles and comments by analysts in Chinese media contained unusual bite.

headline.seo: A Harsh Reception for Clinton in China’s State Media
headline.main: Smiles and Barbs for Clinton in China
headline.print_headline: Smiles and Barbs for Clinton in China
